#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType SwingWeight.

== Name ==

*[SSwingWeight SwingWeight]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--SwingWeight (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Swing weight of a club of golf.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	
{{{
        [B-E][0-9]
}}}
      
    

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CGolfClub GolfClub]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="SwingWeight">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:pattern value="[B-E][0-9]"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
